articles.title: ‘Run’ culture: China’s well-off plot emigration to Southeast Asia - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Desire to escape China’s strict controls has seen ‘influx’ of inquiries about possible move to Singapore, Malaysia or Thailand, observers say.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: S'pore company throws lavish S$4.35mil staff dinner for 26000 in Taiwan - The Star Online
articles.description: KAOHSIUNG (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): This was not your average company dinner: There were fireworks, stage performances by pop singer Wakin Chau and a lavish 12-course meal served to 2,600 banquet tables.
